title: F1: Fernando Alonso hits out at Lewis Hamilton for hypocrisy after urging fans to become vegan
text:
And now Fernando Alonso has condemned Hamilton following social media post

Comments drew criticism, given that he flies around the world to race cars

Lewis Hamilton is a vegan and urged others to adopt plant-based diets last week

Fernando Alonso has hit out at Lewis Hamilton for hypocrisy after he urged fans to take up a vegan diet.

The British driver, who could win his sixth world title in Mexico next weekend, is a vegan and urged others to adopt plant-based diets in an emotional Instagram message he posted and then deleted last week.

'Why bother when the world is such a mess?' he asked.

Fernando Alonso (L) hit out at Lewis Hamilton (R) for hypocrisy following social media post

Mercedes driver Hamilton uploaded a post on his Instagram story to his followers last week

The comments drew criticism, given that he flies around the world to race carbon-emitting cars, and now Alonso has condemned Hamilton.

'I think I would keep my eating habits to myself,' Alonso told Spanish radio station Cope.

'I would never release a message like Lewis. You can't send out a message on one day, and on the next day do the opposite.

'We all know the lifestyle that Lewis has, and that Formula 1 drivers take 200 planes a year. You can't then say "don't eat meat".'

Hamilton did reassure fans that he is 'still fighting' a few days after saying he felt 'like giving up on everything' in despair over the environment.
